edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientSupport

Class NSFieldAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientSupport.NSFieldAccess

  • public class NSFieldAccess
extends Object
    Methods for reading field information in guids on NameServers. Similar code for getting values from the database exists in GnsReconLookup.
    Author:
    westy, arun

      • lookupJSONFieldLocally

        public static ValuesMap lookupJSONFieldLocally(InternalRequestHeader header,
                                               String guid,
                                               String field,
                                               GNSApplicationInterface<String> gnsApp)
                                        throws FailedDBOperationException
        Looks up the value of a field in the guid on this NameServer. Active code is automatically handled during this call. Returns the value of a field in a GUID as a ValuesMap.
        Parameters:
        header -
        guid -
        field -
        gnsApp -
        Returns:
        ResultValue
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

                                                   boolean handleActiveCode)

        Looks up the value of a field in the guid on this NameServer. Active code is handled if handleActiveCode is true. Returns the value of a field in a GUID as a ValuesMap.

      • lookupListFieldLocallyNoAuth

        public static ResultValue lookupListFieldLocallyNoAuth(String guid,
                                                       String field,
                                                       BasicRecordMap database)
        Looks up the value of an old-style list field in the guid on this NameServer. Returns the value of a field in a GUID as a ResultValue or an empty ResultValue if field cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        database -
        Returns:
        ResultValue

      • lookupSingletonFieldOnThisServer

        public static String lookupSingletonFieldOnThisServer(String guid,
                                                      String field,
                                                      BasicRecordMap database)
                                               throws FailedDBOperationException
        Looks up the first element of field in the guid on this NameServer as a String. Returns null if the field or the record cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        database -
        Returns:
        a string representing the first value in field
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • lookupListFieldAnywhere

        public static ResultValue lookupListFieldAnywhere(String guid,
                                                  String field,
                                                  boolean allowRemoteQuery,
                                                  ClientRequestHandlerInterface handler)
                                           throws FailedDBOperationException
        Looks up the value of an old-style list field in the guid. If allowQueryToOtherNSs is true and guid doesn't exists on this Name Server, sends a read query from this Name Server to a Local Name Server. Returns the value of a field in a GUID as a ResultValue.
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        allowRemoteQuery -
        handler -
        Returns:
        ResultValue containing the value of the field or an empty ResultValue if field cannot be found
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException

      • lookupJSONFieldAnywhere

        public static ValuesMap lookupJSONFieldAnywhere(String guid,
                                                String field,
                                                GNSApplicationInterface<String> gnsApp)
                                         throws FailedDBOperationException
        Looks up the value of a field in the guid. If guid doesn't exists on this Name Server, sends a read query from this Name Server to a Local Name Server. Returns the value of a field in a GUID as a ValuesMap
        Parameters:
        guid -
        field -
        gnsApp -
        Returns:
        ValuesMap containing the value of the field or null if field cannot be found
        Throws:
        FailedDBOperationException
